thread.section_title: The Westin San Francisco Airport - UPDATED 2017 Hotel Reviews & Price Comparison (Millbrae, CA) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Reliable Property, Friendly Staff
thread.title_full: Reliable Property, Friendly Staff - Review of The Westin San Francisco Airport, Millbrae, CA - TripAdvisor

author: Julie J
title: Reliable Property, Friendly Staff
text:
The staff are quite friendly and helpful. The property is OK. The long hallways make carrying roller suit cases hard to lug so far. My room was at the very end of the hall. The gym was good. Lots of equipment. The space a bit cramped in the open areas for stretching, core work or weights. Bottled water was available and filtered water.
Room Tip: Try to ask for a room not on the airport side. It tends to be a bit noisy and the building shakes a... See more room tips
